column3: Is SetBannedIsDirty still needed after this?\n
@sipa The flag is still needed for non-user-initiated bans. As implemented here, Ban() doesn't flush to disk automatically for p2p violations.\n
Added a quick fixup for the string comment rather than rebasing and invalidating ACKs. I can squash before merge.\n
utACK 8fe811b (please get rid of the dummy commit)\n
@sipa ah sorry, I missed that note. I'll have a look Monday.\n
No need to change this as well, but it doesn't hurt much, either.\n
Heh, overzealous sed. Thanks, will fix.\n

The variable `bannedNode` seems to be unused here now.

The similar code is a few lines above in `RPCConsole::disconnectSelectedNode()` - same changes needed?

@paveljanik Yea, bannedNode is now unused here. I'll remove.

I only addressed banning here, so no changes needed for disconnectSelectedNode. Disconnect handling comes as a next step.
